verses.verse: Do you <S%H552>indeed<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> silent <S%H482>ones?<s%> Do you <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H4339>blamelessly,<s%> you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men?<s%>
<S%H3820>No,<s%> in your heart you <S%H6466>plot<s%> <S%H5766>injustice.<s%> You <S%H6424>measure<s%> out the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> go <S%H2114>astray<s%> from the <S%H7358>womb.<s%> They are <S%H8582>wayward<s%> as soon as they are <S%H990>born,<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H3577>lies.<s%>
Their <S%H2534>poison<s%> is <S%H1823>like<s%> the <S%H2534>poison<s%> of a <S%H5175>snake;<s%> like a <S%H2795>deaf<s%> <S%H6620>cobra<s%> that <S%H331>stops<s%> its <S%H241>ear,<s%>
which <S%H8085>doesn't<s%> listen to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3907>charmers,<s%> no matter how <S%H2449>skillful<s%> the charmer may <S%H2266>be.<s%>
<S%H2040>Break<s%> their <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> Break <S%H5422>out<s%> the great <S%H4459>teeth<s%> of the young <S%H3715>lions,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Let them vanish as <S%H4325>water<s%> that <S%H1980>flows<s%> <S%H3988>away.<s%> When they <S%H1869>draw<s%> the <S%H2671>bow,<s%> let their arrows be made <S%H4135>blunt.<s%>
Let them be like a <S%H7642>snail<s%> which <S%H8557>melts<s%> and passes <S%H1980>away,<s%> like the <S%H5309>stillborn<s%> <S%H802>child,<s%> who has not <S%H2372>seen<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>
Before your <S%H5518>pots<s%> can <S%H995>feel<s%> the heat of the <S%H329>thorns,<s%> he will <S%H8175>sweep<s%> away the <S%H2416>green<s%> and the burning <S%H2740>alike.<s%>

The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> when he <S%H2372>sees<s%> the <S%H5359>vengeance.<s%> He shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H6471>feet<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%>

so that <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> "Most certainly there is a <S%H6529>reward<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%> Most certainly there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H8199>judges<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
